properties.description: Detects when a file share is deleted from Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 28920
| extend Name =  extract("Name=\"(?<Name>[^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Data SourceName"] = Name,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: File Share Deleted
